text: For more than twenty years, Leslie Moonves has been one of the most powerful media executives in America. As the chairman and C. E. O. of CBS Corporation, he oversees shows ranging from “ 60 Minutes ” to “ The Big Bang Theory. ” His portfolio includes the premium cable channel Showtime, the publishing house Simon & Schuster, and a streaming service, CBS All Access. Moonves, who is sixty - eight, has a reputation for canny hiring and project selection. The Wall Street Journal recently called him a “ TV programming wizard ” ; the Hollywood Reporter dubbed him a “ Wall Street Hero. ” In the tumultuous field of network television, he has enjoyed rare longevity as a leader.
